name: @wikipathways/gpml
description: Schemas and test cases for GPML XML file format.

scripts.prepare: npm-run-all prepare:* && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.prepare:gpml2pvjson: echo 'Setting expected JSON versions of GPML files' && source_dirname=./test; for source_file in $source_dirname/**/*.gpml*; do output_file=`echo $source_file | sed 's/\.xml//' | sed 's/\.gpml//'`".json"; echo $output_file; cat "$source_file" | gpml2pvjson > "$output_file"; done && echo ok || echo not ok

author: WikiPathways team
